description: The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) has an immediate requirement for the purchase and delivery of 6 Video Probes...
full_summary:
=====================================

**Procurement Notification**

**Publication Date**: March 2, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: April 4, 2023, at 14:00 EDT (Expired)
=====================================

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the purchase and delivery of video probes and carrying cases.

**Scope of Work**
----------------

The CBSA requires six (6) video probes, including six carrying cases, with a one-year warranty. The video probes must be capable of detecting contraband, illicit drugs, banned substances, and potential explosive devices at Canadian marine ports.

**Selection Criteria**
---------------------

The proposal selection will be based on a combined rating of technical merit and price. The proposal that achieves the highest combined rating will be deemed the successful bid.

**procurement Details**
----------------------

*   **Reference Number**: WS3885784370-Doc3899933797
*   **Solicitation Number**: WS3885784370
*   **Amendment Number**: 1
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: March 8, 2023
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: None
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Regions of Opportunity**: None
*   **Regions of Delivery**: Ottawa, Ontario
*   **Contact Information**
    *   **Name**: Bellerdine, Chad
    *   **Email**: [chad.bellerdine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:chad.bellerdine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
    *   ***phone***: None
    *   ***fax***: None
    *   ***address***: None

**Submission Requirements**
-------------------------

All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by March 21, 2023, at 14:00 EDT. Late submissions will be declared non-responsive. The bid submission must meet the requirements specified in the RFP.

**Ariba Discovery Link**
--------------------------




*https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15580383?extsite=MTU1ODAzODNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==*
